modules.title: Introduction to HTML
modules.description: Learn the basics of HTML and how to structure web pages.

modules.title: CSS Fundamentals
modules.description: Understand the principles of CSS and how to style web pages.

modules.title: JavaScript Basics
modules.description: Get introduced to JavaScript and learn how to make web pages interactive.

learningObjectives: Use generative AI tools to help develop ideas and content, make more informed decisions, and speed up daily work tasks
Use AI responsibly by identifying AI's potential biases and avoiding harm
Write clear and specific prompts to get the output you want - you'll apply prompting techniques to help summarize, create tag lines, and more
Develop strategies to stay up-to-date in the emerging landscape of AI
